creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
slight restructuring of andreas' fix for the changePassword security issue
(http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=412987&view=rev).

the main difference is that in this patch, the changePassword usecase for
ordinary users  cannot set the userId param at all.

plus the naming is a little more consistent.

Created attachment 18438
introduced an abstract class to cleanly separate the feature sets of changePassword and changePasswordAdmin.

please review and apply if appropriate.
creator: nettings@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18439
make change password dialog accessible through the gui

this patch adds a "change password" option to the file menu, and a "change
password" button to the admin.user usecase. display the name of the user whose
password is about to be changed.
